bibl.title: Menander the Poet or Menander Rhetor? An Encomium of Dioscoros Again.
bibl.note: Argues that the Menander mentioned in P. lit. Lond. 98 + P. Reinach II, 82 (= M.-P.3 348.02; LDAB 817), Encomium in acrostics to Romanus by Dioscoros of Aphrodite, was not the Hellenistic playwright, but Menander Rhetor. Observations on the poem.
CRIBIORE Raffaella, Menander the Poet or Menander Rhetor? An Encomium of Dioscoros Again.
364 Dioscorus Aphroditensis Menander D Menander Rhetor
